lines.text: [Matt speaks over Joe and Jane's graves]
I guess you can see it clear now, John... you and Jane. Keep that light on for me.
You know, it's funny. When I was a kid, I heard a lot about this great Dodge City marshal.
Yeah. Seems like you dwindled some since then, huh?
Yeah, not enough to stop me from robbery and murder, huh?
Wouldn't be the first time a lawman turned outlaw.
Yeah, or the other way around.
